entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:25 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-la-Madeleine 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.2°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
